column2: 2015. of st. paul died tragically on june 12
column3: 2015 at age 31. preceded in death by grandmother marla kaye; father wade; uncle rick. survived by mom yolanda; sisters kari (tim) & kayla (jimmy); brother william; many aunts
column6: nephews & friends. funeral service tuesday (6/23) 11:00 am at sandberg funeral home
column9: with visitation one hour prior to service. he will be sadly missed. memorials may be made by going to gotofund. com under jeffrey lerew. sandberg funeral & cremation service2593 east 7th avenue north st. paul
